txt.en: 'Reeve Athelward has called for the people here to evacuate their lands, and has requested that all able riders report to his commanders in Cliving. The crofters here have refused to leave their homes, and in turn, Elfmar's most brave and skilful riders have offered to stay and protect them. Elfmar has agreed to prepare his riders, the Elfward, to repel the White Hand forces gathering to the north.'
